Key Match Events: Che Adams scored in the 95th minute but the goal was disallowed for offside
Pre-Game Insights: Scotland were without over a dozen players due to injuries
Ben Doak got his first start for Scotland
Craig Gordon made his first appearance for Scotland since November 2022
Scotland struggled with a depleted squad
Post-Match Reflections: Steve Clarke praised his players for their effort
Scotland went into their next match against Portugal with a poor record
Miscellaneous Highlights: Hanley slipped and allowed Matanovic to score
Scotland had several chances but missed them
